title: Physics on television
creator_credit: Gordon Severn and Centre for Educational Television Overseas
brief_description: Some practical problems in producing an educational television program on physics. Shows good and bad displays, difficulties in showing laboratory equipment, use of filmed inserts, split screen and superimposition.
